alert.note: Alert for Eastern Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued January 22 at 2:59PM EST until January 24 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH IS CANCELLED FOR TONIGHT... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 possible. * WHERE...Eastern Putnam County. * WHEN...From late Sunday night through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Appropriate action should be taken to ensure tender vegetation and outdoor pets have adequate protection from the cold temperatures. Young children, the elderly and the homeless are especially vulnerable to the cold. Take measures to protect them.
